paper.title: STOCK RETURNS AND EXCHANGE RATE NEXUS IN GHANA: A BAYESIAN QUANTILE REGRESSION APPROACH
paper.abstract: This paper presents analysis of the relationship and dependence structure between stock returns and exchange rates in Ghana using data of daily periodicity from January 4, 2011 to July 31, 2014. Analyses are conducted by means of Bayesian quantile regression (QR) technique and multiple causality tests. Our findings suggest high dependence of the equity market on the foreign exchange market in Ghana, and that the link between the two markets follows the international trade-oriented model more than the portfolio balance theory. We report that among the six exchange rates used, only the cedi-dollar registers instantaneous effect on the equity market.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究股票回报与汇率之间的关系和依赖结构，并未明确指出其核心技术应用于衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理。虽然涉及金融市场分析，但不属于上述特定金融领域。
